example.metakeywords: php ajax, php ajax framework, php callback, ajax for php, php ajax examples, php ajax scripts, php ajax tutorial, php ajax post, php ajax toolkit
example.metadescription: KoolAjax is a great PHP Ajax Framework. This example shows how to set loading images for KoolAjax's UpdatePanel.
example.description:
Using UpdatePanel of KoolAjax is very easy way to update partial page.
It has function setLoading() which improve the performance for your page with many effect.
Here is the structure of function : setLoading(string image,[ string backColor],[ int opacity])
Arguments:
image: Src of loading image ( link to the image )
backColor: Color of background
opacity: Transparent value of loading, max value is 100
